abstract: Hockey Roundup; Montreal Canadiens beat Ottawa Senators, 2-0, to advance to Eastern Conference semifinals; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Montreal won its series against Ottawa in six games as goaltender Carey Price made 43 saves.

headline.main: Canadiens Advance Past Senators; Parise Scores Twice as Wild Oust Blues
headline.print_headline: Canadiens Advance Past Senators; Parise Scores Twice as Wild Oust Blues

snippet: Montreal won its series against Ottawa in six games as goaltender Carey Price made 43 saves.
